results.content: Highly professional course, in terms of structure, content, accuracy and  explanation. PACKT content is high quality, dense and fast paced, no time wasted on repetition like other courses.
results.content_html: Highly professional course, in terms of structure, content, accuracy and explanation. PACKT content is high quality, dense and fast paced, no time wasted on repetition like other courses.

results.content: This course is 3 years old.  It is hard to follow, and the instructor doesn't tell you the why of what you are doing.  The instruction is drier than the desert, you get no answers to the questions you ask, and the code simply does not work.  Not only that but the code shown in the course differs from that of the download provided and neither set of code works.  I threw my hands up in frustration with this course.  I've taken some really good courses via udemy and some bad ones, and unfortunately this one was a bad one that wasted my precious time.
results.content_html: This course is 3 years old. It is hard to follow, and the instructor doesn't tell you the why of what you are doing. The instruction is drier than the desert, you get no answers to the questions you ask, and the code simply does not work.
